relation: There is a lot to do in springfield you just have to find the time.
Get classes that you think you will enjoy and don't be afraid to make new friends.
It is very fun and all the students here are very friendly. If you are up to it then it is easy to make new friends. I enjoy going here and the classes are hands on which is great.
pageTitle: Ozarks Technical Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Will enjoy being here The atmosphere seems very up beat the students seem to be a happy and content to be there Will learn a lot I hope to learn every thing I need to graduate Login to rate or flag the reviews Valerie from Cassville, MO 01/09/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 59 Categories Comments Campus Safety The campus is highly secure, and there is even a shuttle bus that can drive you to the campus if you parked far away. Security is very good all around as well. Greek Life There are a couple or so but I do not know exactly what their names are. Clubs and Activities There are
